title: STK Steakhouse operates in London, England
statement: STK Steakhouse operates two London locations: Stratford (40 Celebration Ave, East Village) and Strand (336-337 Strand)

citations.quote: London - Stratford The Gantry, 40 Celebration Ave, East Village, London E20 1DB... London - Strand 336-337 Strand, London WC2R 1HA
